name: MagicalPlants by Seelifisho
description:
What will you do if the future of your village suddenly lies in your hands?

Will you be their hero? Or go choose your own path?

Your choices will lead the way. - GamePlay -    play through a variety of levels    make decisions that will influence the levels and endings    find the hidden level for an extra ending - Endings -    three endings can be reached    each ending comes with a different story - Controls -    keyboard and mouse/touchpad only    move with A and D    jump with Space    interact with E    control through the dialogues with Mouse and Space - Credits -   Soundtrack by FlatTheory, Mahlert, Felix Johansson and Lotus   everything else is made by Seelifisho
